vote.title: An ordinance amending Chapter 28, “Motor Vehicles and Traffic,” of the Dallas City Code by amending Sections 28-50, 28-59, 28-99, and 28-101 (1) designating school traffic zones; (2) designating one-way streets and alleys; (3) designating public carrier stands for rideshare vehicles; (4) providing a penalty not to exceed $200.00; (5) providing a saving clause; (6) providing a severability clause; and (7) providing an effective date - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
vote.description: An ordinance amending Chapter 28, “Motor Vehicles and Traffic,” of the Dallas City Code by amending Sections 28-50, 28-59, 28-99, and 28-101 (1) designating school traffic zones; (2) designating one-way streets and alleys; (3) designating public carrier stands for rideshare vehicles; (4) providing a penalty not to exceed $200.00; (5) providing a saving clause; (6) providing a severability clause; and (7) providing an effective date - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
